description: This file defines an abstract Java class 'ValueProviderBase' which provides a framework for completing command-line argument values within a Spring Shell context. It includes methods for retrieving possible values and generating completion proposals based on a prefix.

classes.name: ValueProviderBase
classes.description: An abstract base class for providing auto-completion values within Spring Shell, requiring subclasses to define available values.

methods.name: complete
methods.description: Generates a list of CompletionProposal objects for command-line completion based on the current prefix.
